headline: USA surge and France fall in Women’s World Ranking

headline: Spurs Women sign Aussie international Clare Hunt from PSG
summary: Tottenham Hotspur have signed Australia international Clare Hunt from Paris Saint-Germain on a three-year contract. She helped the Matildas reach the 2023 World Cup semi-finals and made the tournament’s All-star XI, as well as playing […]
